original_text: And when the dragon saw that he was cast unto the earth, he persecuted the woman which brought forth the man child.
korean_text: 용이 자기가 땅으로 내쫓긴 것을 보고 남자를 낳은 여자를 박해하는지라

sentences.original_text: that he was cast unto the earth
which brought forth the man child
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여자는 남자 아이를 낳은 자였음
